required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Effects of Multimodal Treatment of Headache in a Day Clinic Service
clinical_study.official_title: Effects of Multimodal Treatment of Headache in a Day Clinic Service: a Prospective Case-crossover Study

brief_summary.textblock:
The observational study aims to investigate the effects of a multimodal treatment program for headache patients in a day clinic service. The setting provides one week of treatment including a combination of medical consultation, physiotherapy, psychological therapy, occupational therapy, progressive muscle relaxation and disease specific education.
Outcome measures are the disease-specific impact on daily activities, general quality of life, psychological impact and headache frequency. Moreover, the study sought to identify parameters that best predict efficacy of the intervention. Therefore, standardized questionnaires are established in three points in time, to evaluate the pre- and post-treatment status.

primary_outcome.measure: Change of Veterans RAND 12 Item Health Survey (VR-12) mental health score
primary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
primary_outcome.description: questionnaire, patient self-report, 12 questions, minimum value: 12 points, maximum value: 54 points, physical and mental health component summary score compared to a t-score with a mean value of 50 and standard deviation of 10

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of Depression Anxiety and Stress Scale (DASS)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: questionnaire, patient self-report, 21 questions, 7 questions per subscale (Depression, Anxiety and Stress), minimum value: 0 points, maximum value: 21 points per subscale, higher score = worse outcome

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: questionnaire, patient self-report, minimum value: 36 points, maximum value: 78 points, higher score = worse outcome

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: average pain intensity in the last month, scale 1 to 10, higher score = worse outcome

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: in days per month, referring to the last month, minimum value: 0 days/month, maximum value: 30 days/month

secondary_outcome.measure: Change of Veterans RAND 12 Item Health Survey (VR-12) physical health score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
secondary_outcome.description: questionnaire, patient self-report, 12 questions, minimum value: 12 points, maximum value: 54 points, physical and mental health component summary score compared to a t-score with a mean value of 50 and standard deviation of 10

other_outcome.measure: Change of Veterans RAND 12 Item Health Survey (VR-12) single domains
other_outcome.time_frame: 4 weeks prior to treatment appointment, day 1 of treatment, 3 month after the treatment
other_outcome.description: questionnaire, patient self-report, 12 questions, minimum value: 12 points, maximum value: 54 points, physical and mental health component summary score compared to a t-score with a mean value of 50 and standard deviation of 10

arm_group.description: Participants enquired prior to the treatment appointment in the neurological day clinic service, no intervention
Participants enquired after the treatment in the Neurological day clinic service

intervention.description: combination of medical consultations, psychological therapy, physiotherapy, occupational therapy, disease specific education und progressive muscle relaxation

study_pop.textblock: All patients seen in the neurological day clinic service will be screened for eligibility.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- diagnosis of a headache disorder
- written informed consent for collecting and analysing data and conducting a follow-up evaluation
Exclusion Criteria:
- premature interruption of the treatment
- repeated treatment
